sacl-desc: Allows access restrictions to be set with Semantic MediaWiki properties
sacl-denied: You are not on the access list for this page.
sacl-template-render-denied-anonymous: You must [[Special:UserLogin|log in]] to view this template.
sacl-template-render-denied-registered: You do not have the required permissions to view this template.
sacl-key-too-short: The key must be more than 6 characters long.
